verses.name: 1 Chronicles 4:32
verses.text: And their villages were, Etam, and Ain, Rimmon, and Tochen, and Ashan, five cities:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 4:33
verses.text: And all their villages that were round about the same cities, unto Baal. These were their habitations, and their genealogy.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 4:34
verses.text: And Meshobab, and Jamlech, and Joshah the son of Amaziah,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 4:35
verses.text: And Joel, and Jehu the son of Josibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 4:36
verses.text: And Elioenai, and Jaakobah, and Jeshohaiah, and Asaiah, and Adiel, and Jesimiel, and Benaiah,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 4:37
verses.text: And Ziza the son of Shiphi, the son of Allon, the son of Jedaiah, the son of Shimri, the son of Shemaiah;
